explanation: [0-0] In a grassy field, a young girl with long hair, wearing a white top and jeans, stands in front of a yellow horse with a black and white mane, grazing with its head down. Behind them stands a woman wearing a black top, white shoes, and sunglasses on her head. In the distant background, there are lush woods, several houses, and in front of the houses, groups of people in different clothes and a few cars.

[0-4] The little girl then grabs the horse's mane, jumps forward, and clamps her legs around the horse's neck. The horse, feeling the little girl jump on its back, takes a few steps back and raises its neck, allowing the little girl to climb onto its back more easily.

[10-12] Finally, the little girl adjusts her posture, swings her legs forward, puts her hands behind her for support, pushes forward, and slides down the back of the horse. She lands steadily on the ground and walks to the right side of the frame.
